alert.note: Alert for Kossuth (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 24 at 10:58PM CDT until June 24 at 11:30PM CDT by NWS DesMoines
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1130 PM CDT FOR WEST CENTRAL KOSSUTH AND NORTHEASTERN PALO ALTO COUNTIES... At 1057 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Emmetsburg, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters reported golf ball sized hail in Emmetsburg. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Cylinder, Whittemore and Fenton. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
